channel.title: Fletching interface
channel.description: ok when i use a knife on logs all it does is make a short bow, how do i get the interface that lets u choose from short bow, long bow, ect, i really need this in my client because i want people to be able to make short and long bows, also arrows with the first log. can anyone help?

item.title: Fletching interface
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

ok when i use a knife on logs all it does is make a short bow, how do i get the interface that lets u choose from short bow, long bow, ect, i really need this in my client because i want people to be able to make short and long bows, also arrows with the first log. can anyone help?
